name: Ceiling Closure Checklist 1 Rough In [B]
Air Conditioning
Inspection Date:
Air Conditioning:
Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Units all hung with isolation mounts and with 5% fall to drain point
Other services installed are not impeding access to fan coil
Wiring connected to indoor unit electrical box
Condensate drainage is in correct location & height
Filter Track for return air have been installed at the back of unit
All flexible ducts connections to air terminlas and spigots have been air tight by using duct tape
All flexible ducts connections to air terminlas and spigots have been secured by using fixing ties/cables ties
Fresh air to apartment
Ventilation
Ventilation:
Inspection Date:
Fans installed within ceiling areas are in the correct location as per Mechanical Drawings
Fans Installed correctly with rubber isolation pads
All Flex has been run to correct location
All flex are hung independent of other services and supported by intact load spreaders
All flexible ducts have been mechanically secured to spigots and air terminals by using fixing ties
Butterfly dampers are installed on the PODs grille neck and they are in a fully opened position and air tight sealed
PVC sleeves has been installed in wet area walls
Vent boxes are intalled in correct location as per RCP and SEALED
PVC ducts have been hung and supported indicidually by using hanging straps
